job.title: Network Engineer // Cisco // DFW
job.description:
Motion Recruitment is partnering up with a global leader in Infrastructure Services to help them bring on a Cisco Network Engineer. This will be a 3 month contract-to-hire position in Irving, Texas.
As a Cisco Network Engineer, your scope of work will involve new virtual ASA configurations within a cloud environment for disaster recovery services.
Carolyn Regimbal
